=== Last Position ===
(row = 11, col = 2)

Given that the avatar's position has not changed from the last state, we need to take a different action from the previous input.

The avatar is currently at (row = 11, col = 2) and needs to collect resources in the specified order while avoiding the chef and walls. 

In the current state, the nearby resource to collect next is sugar at (row = 10, col = 17). Since the last action did not result in any change of position, we will try a movement in a new direction. Moving up to (row = 10, col = 2) seems to be unobstructed to collect the butter directly adjacent to the sugar.

Thus, I will perform the action to move Up.

``` Action: 4 ``` 

I expect this action to put the avatar in a position to navigate towards the necessary resources while staying safe from the chef.
